data.actual_result: After trying to select your Paypal account, the window closes, and your credit card is still selected
data.expected_result: You should be able to select your Paypal account
data.short_description: Trying to select PayPal to resubscribe to Nitro causes the selection popup to close without actually selecting your Paypal account
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord Nitro bought with a credit card, with your subscription still running (Yearly in my case) - Have a Paypal account added through the "Billing" tab in settings - Head over to the Discord Nitro tab - Click on the "Pay For It With" selection - Try to select your Paypal account
